alert.note: Alert for Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 26 at 4:29AM AKST until February 27 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Inner Channels including Ketchikan, Metlakatla, Thorne Bay, Kasaan, and other adjacent communities. * WHEN...From noon Saturday to 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very gusty conditions are expected through Sunday morning. Expect the strongest gusts to occur Saturday evening.
info.instruction: People should prepare for possible power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
